text: listen I know you have your beliefs and
I totally respect that but I bought
something for you before I knew about
the whole atheist thing and I've been
holding on to it which is really silly
because it's just a beautiful piece of
jewelry oh my look at that there's a
little Jesus on there well that's one
way of looking at it or it's just a
pretty necklace with a very fit
long-haired hippie on a cross it doesn't
matter who you think it is there's no
denying that the blue of his tears
